response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We believe its worth far surpasses $1,500,000, but considering the current market conditions and the unique opportunity it presents, we are offering it to you at this exceptional price. This is a chance to acquire something truly remarkable at an exclusive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with the purchase or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 1500000}
